event.title: Resorts near delhi for New year's eve
event.description:
Enjoy our site Delhi to Shimla as we present our readers the Live New Years Eve Party 2017 in Shimla on 31st December 2011 at 7 pm onwards. Keep an eye on our site.

With the beginning of the Christmas and New Year we all make a lot of resolutions and try to bring about a change. Why wait for the clock to strike 12:00 on 31st December? We would take you through a whole new idea to Celebrate New Year and Christmas and to experience a bliss full change just before you make any at the comfort of your home.

Tired of the same old drinking and dancing in a club or at a farmhouse and getting up with a heavy head same as New Year Party in Shimla every New Year Eve Packages give. We would share with you a new experience – New Year in Shimla – fun, adventure and entertainment without missing out on your wish to dance away on the New Year Eve in Shimla. This time let’s welcome 2018 in a stylish way from your beautiful home and stay away from crowd. You’ll get to see a New Year Party 2017 online where everything is done up in a unique and a tasteful manner keeping in mind both modern luxuries and old fashioned amenities.
